page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: My mother gets up at approximately 7.30 a.m. and prepares breakfast for the rest of the family.After we have all gone to school or to work she begins the day's housework. At about 11.15 a.m. my mother leaves on her bicycle for work.She is a mid-day assistant at a nearby school.She arrives at the school at 11.45 and for the next one and a half hours supervises the children during their meal-break.At 1.15 p.m. she has her own meal in the school canteen and leaves at about 2 p.m. During the afternoon mum will do the shopping and then return home to continue with the housework and prepare the evening meal.After this she completes her jobs and then relaxes by watching television, gardening or playing badminton. By Penny Bell.
